SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.distributable

Class DeckPersonal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.distributable.DeckPersonal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Distributable<PersonalGoalCard>
public class DeckPersonal extends Object implements Distributable<PersonalGoalCard>
DeckPersonal is an implementation of the Distributable interface, it deals with personalCards, It can be used to draw personal cards. As a factory method, it creates only the necessary cards based on a given configuration.

  • Constructor Summary

    DeckPersonal(String configurationFile, String pointsReferenceFile)
    The deckPersonal constructor assign the configurations parameters in order to create the cards.

  • Constructor Details

    • DeckPersonal

      public DeckPersonal(String configurationFile, String pointsReferenceFile) throws IllegalFilePathException
      The deckPersonal constructor assign the configurations parameters in order to create the cards.
      Parameters:
      configurationFile - used for the card pattern
      pointsReferenceFile - used to create a reference for the points
      Throws:
      IllegalFilePathException - one of the argument is an empty string

  • Method Details

    • draw

      public ArrayList<PersonalGoalCard> draw(int nElements) throws NotEnoughCardsException, NegativeFieldException
      Draw method consents to draw a number of PersonalGoalCard elements
      Specified by:
      draw in interface Distributable<PersonalGoalCard>
      Parameters:
      nElements - the number of elements to draw
      Returns:
      an ArrayList that contains the drawn elements
      Throws:
      NotEnoughCardsException - if the number of cards read from the JSON is less than the nElements required
      NegativeFieldException - if nElements less or equal to 0
